name: This runs on blood  " Youngre Strangre "
description:
Single song 7" 45. Silk screened, hand stiched cover.

Amazing manic 3 piece hardcore from the mountains of Arizona.spazzy and epic .

name: This runs on blood lp
description: 12" 180grm 45. CD included. There are very few of these so get it while you can!

name: Transient
description: New review (verbatim) from Short Fast and Loud Issue 20 for s/t 7": "Noisey abrasive as sand paper on you taint!! Total beastial blast beats and low, crushing down-tuneage on the git= one fucked up destruction unit here from Portland! Cool stop and start grindcore bits with fire-breathing gal on the mic, this shit in not for timid or your grandmother. Sounds like DISCORDANCE AXIS getting attacked with a fire extinguisher. Gnarly nuclear blastcore. " The Defector Issue 41

name: Transient/This runs on blood split
description:
This runs on blood / Transient on blue vinyl/ It has hand stiched packaging limited to 550.
This runs on blood is noisy hardcore from Flagstaff AZ. (ex Stab city, Ruinacre, Shitbastard) Chaotic and epic screamed 3 piece modern hardcore insanity. One new track and one track an  inspired retake on The Narrows. (from Belingham WA)
Transient is punk grind violence from portland OR. 4 tracks of vehament grind  with incredible med vocals.

name: THIS RUNS ON BLOOD "The ocean in black and white"  LP
description:
New This Runs on Blood LP
This Runs on Blood “The ocean in black and white ” Lp 200 on Marble 300 on white vinyl.This Manic slab takes This Runs on Blood on an even stranger ride this is a new sound for modern hardcore .Samples,noise, screams and still no bass.After a 12inch EP,The Youngre Strangre 7″ and the split 7 with Portland brutal grind outfit Transient.This Runs on Blood first true full length shows a new level of song writing and experimentation spazztic truly epic and I believe something new for hardcore and punk as a whole. Also featuring more amazing art work by nil ultra..This is for the Marble vinyl only available here.
